Big Cheer Logo

Home/Portfolio/Big Cheer

Released :November 2014

Role :Design

Client :Yarnee

Tools:Sketch, Affinity Designer

Big Cheer

As Lead Product Designer, i enjoyed a central role in developing the design strategy and supporting development of the app from concept to delivery.

Working closely with the development team, I produced detailed design proposals to create an immersive and entertaining mobile experience tailored to the US sports market, with the inclusion of ESPNU mascots and college teams.

Big Cheer Logo

Get noticed and be seen with something better than a cardboard sign. Use Big Cheer to put multiple iPads next to each other to create a jumbo screen!

So whether it’s in-stadium at a game, at a tailgate event, or in front of the TV cameras, any group with iPads can put up an eye-catching sign.

Blue Jays, circa. 1974

Ballin'.

Big Cheer App
